# Jennifer Smith

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Occupation**: Independent Financial Planner
- **Years Of Experience**: 12
- **Education**: Bachelor's in Finance from Columbia University
- **Certifications**: Certified Financial Planner (CFP)
- **Hobbies**: Reading mystery novels and hiking
- **Languages Spoken**: English and Spanish
- **Volunteer Work**: Financial literacy workshops at local community centers
- **Client Specialization**: Families with young children
- **Office Location**: Chicago, IL
- **Phone Contact**: 312-555-0134
- **Email Contact**: jennifer.smith@finplanner.com
- **Website**: www.jennifersmithfinancial.com
- **Personal Goal**: To empower 1,000 families to achieve financial independence by 2025
- **Favorite Quote**: "Failing to plan is planning to fail." - Alan Lakein
- **Mentors**: Worked under Sarah Johnson, a renowned financial advisor, for 5 years

## Relationships
- **Receives_Advice_From**: [[mark_johnson.md]]

# Budgeting Tools

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: service
- **Type**: Entity
- **Primary Features**: Expense tracking, savings goal setting, bill reminders
- **User Friendliness**: High, designed for non-expert users
- **Integration Capabilities**: Compatible with various bank APIs
- **Security Features**: Two-factor authentication, data encryption
- **Mobile App**: True
- **Price Model**: Freemium with premium subscription options
- **Customer Support**: 24/7 helpline and chat support available
- **Core Technology**: AI-driven personalized recommendations
- **Initial Release Year**: 2015
- **Usage Statistics**: Used by over 10,000 families monthly

## Relationships
- **Provides**: [[jennifer_smith.md]]

# College Savings Plan

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: financial_product
- **Type**: Entity
- **Eligibility Requirements**: Must have a minimum annual income of $30,000
- **Annual Fee**: 0.75
- **Tax Advantages**: Tax-free growth and withdrawals for qualified educational expenses
- **Maximum Contribution Limit**: 11500
- **Flexibility**: Can be used at any accredited college or university in the US
- **State Sponsored**: False
- **Investment Options**: Includes international stocks, bond index funds, and domestic equities
- **Risk Level**: Moderate
- **Launch Date**: April 2011
- **Customer Support Hours**: 9am - 6pm Central Time, Monday to Friday

## Relationships
- **Offers**: [[jennifer_smith.md]]
